photos.caption: Photo of PBR Rock Bar & Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Breakfast pizza
Photo of PBR Rock Bar & Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Vr8ZZKxfJxRzha9bzxp5_A.text: Just stumbled into this place by chance while looking for a place to eat. The country music caught our ear so we had to check the place out. Sat at the bar and ordered the go to, jack and coke. Ordered the rib eye for the wife and I to share. It's a country bar so my expectations for the steak weren't very high but it sounded good. Drinks came back and were spot on! A little on the strong side but still drinkable. The rib eye was  amazing.  It was very tender and full of flavor, smothered with grilled onion. It was far better than anything I expected.   All in all.  This place seemed like a pretty cool spot.   Got to watch all the wanna be cowboys and cowgirls getting tossed on the mechanical bull.  Definitely will be going back.

tdb_wACU1FXEQ9vjS4jaTA.text: Came in last Wednesday n sat on the patio.  Great atmosphere and Cesar the bartender was awesome!! Definitely made it an even better experience for me and my friends!!

96j_sQSKUUJUnWaopOeIfw.text: Manager Tammy was so welcoming during my last visit. She ensured that we had a great time from start to finish. She provided excellent service and very prompt deliver of the sharables and drinks, which was very much appreciated. I was first introduced to this hidden gem for a Yelp Event a few months back and we had the time of our lives.  Seriously, yelp events are soooo much fun, you need to get more active folks so you can join the fun and be exposed to some neat spots to invite your friends from in town and out of town.   They have an excellent array of options on the menu, seriously I can not even tell you which was my favorite because I devoured most of them.  Please go to this bar, if you're up for it ride the mechanical bull and call yourself a cowboy/cowgirl!

R9WtYaY4ww-Ptb1et3yShw.text: Pasbie is great!! She reccomend great food and drinks.. the fish bowl is so worth it! 4 of us drank from it and had so much fun! I ordered the salmon salad which was refreshing. Very good flavor. My husband got the steak- medium. It was the best! My friend got a burger and she thought it was amazing. However, th restroom were pretty thrashed and it was in the afternoon-3pm.

f7XC3pfI_1tzoqccBX5XrA.text: Total disappointment. Cold wings , over cooked and dry. Burgers on the same platform and have had a better burger at Burger King.  Service was decent

tNFsCv2BH6sBwY3_EMD90g.text: I don't think anybody is going to come here because of the food.  It's OK.  It's the ambience, attitude, and the BIG ASS drinks.  And, to watch the ladies jiggle on the mechanical bull and the hilarity when somebody gets thrown off.  I gotta say the 100oz drink I had was fairly weak.  I shouldn't have been able to finish the entire thing and not felt that tipsy.  Kinda disappointed that it was more juice than liquor.  The waitresses at the bar were a little less than attentive. But, when they did get to me, they were friendly and smiled.  I like to be served by people who at least look like they enjoy their jobs.  I would definitely say to check this place out - you'll at least get a kick out of watching people get thrown from the mechanical bull.

8ePMEmygy_kyEDxFE7C9WQ.text: The worst dining experience I've ever had. Our hostess sat us next to a rowdy bunch who were loud and shouted profanities during the course of our entire meal. You would think the manager of the establishment would ask the group to pipe it down or offer us another table. My guest were from out of town and I'm sure they were totally dissatisfied with their dining experience and hospitality of this establishment.

qIGys2Upj9C69iAB1KRWUA.text: The patio is a great place to sit and listen to live music right on the strip.  I highly recommend the frozen daquiris here, especially the strawberry margarita flavor. You can get frozen daiquiris all over Vegas though so I don't know if these are necessarily better than others. I had two meals here and both were above average but still bar food. It's worth having breakfast here as it's pretty tasty and low cost. The burger was good although nothing that stands out. My only complaint is that there is a Yelp check-in offer of "buy one drink get one free" and they refused to allow it to count for non-alcoholic beverages. That's a bit unfair for those that aren't drinking because two non-alcoholic drinks end up costing more than two alcoholic drinks with the deal. They should consider respecting those that aren't drinking or who can't drink and offer something with the Yelp check-in.

bFQbirjlnL-LtTxFUjO3yQ.text: I really enjoyed this location right in Planet Hollywood. Looking for a quick but tasty bite to eat,  stop here!! I had the Smoking Jerk Burger which has a spicy little kick to it (with pineapple on it) and some fries. Burger was very delicious!! Wings were good too.   What I really enjoyed about my experience here was the waiter we had. A very nice energetic young lady who was nice & very attentive. She made it a great experience and overall ambiance was cool; tv's to watch all the games on.  Service was so good here I came back the very next day because I knew the food would be good and the service as well.  Free bull ride available as too.

ZezGBOsRWsM8yIeIYZTHAg.text: There are plenty of options in the Miracle Mile Shops to eat, ended up going here. Did not regret that actually, it's a nice bar to be in any case, but also the choice of food is very nice. Was very hungry and had a philli the Chili bowl.....wow, what a great Chili and more than enough. We been a few times all was good .this review is from a little while back  going get them on here

mXJY_EVsfMkobwwgZbC-qg.text: Meghan, Jen Meligan, Kevin Smith are the best bartenders! Attentive,  free pour, and great customer service! We spent hours here! Meghan made a perfect Vegas Vacation in a fish bowl! Jen checked on us, offered recommendations and was as sweet as can be!

Wat9FGAg6-l2T15yuhTsDg.text: I've always liked this place and we always come back here. Pretty standard for food and everything. Nothing spectacular but the place is just cool!

-UF__Pl1cI59taxtRYZCvw.text: We've been here 3 times. Once in may 2018.  Sat and waited for water and service for 15 minutes while we watched several employees talking by the hostess stand.  We left and went inside where we complained, service inside was only slightly better.  Feb 2019 we went twice, still very slow service in the early afternoon,  but great service for early am.  Good food.

44wFJSR-HGE5EUJ0whijbA.text: Great place for breakfast!  Fast, friendly and food was hot!  Best screwdrivers in town.  Crystal was an amazing waitress.

photos.caption: Photo of PBR Rock Bar & Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Rl1KGA5hI67vmcvWbaDugA.text: I had the California chicken sand which with bacon and avocado and a cold bud light and neither was a disappointment. Rustic little joint but with a modern twist, staff were very friendly and overall I enjoyed it!

TheKMpzQ2bwOeLN6yVCquQ.text: We had a blast here on our last day in Vegas. Our waiter was super friendly and helpful, the drinks were good although pricy (hey it's Vegas) and the food we had was excellent. If you go here try the house nachos served on house made kettle chips they are awesome ! Free mechanical bull rides with a drink purchase and man you have to try that out, it is a blast even if it was a short ride for me! I posted a few pictures of the menu of your curious, it's not cheap but nothing in Vegas is! Typically there are guys out front handing out two for one drink cards, grab one and head in and scope it out ! Plenty of TV's to catch a game or whatever your interested in, the music is good and the atmosphere is excellent !

photos.caption: Photo of PBR Rock Bar & Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chow menu
Photo of PBR Rock Bar & Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Drink menu
Photo of PBR Rock Bar & Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Czs93Il-je7Dk57NPSZ8kQ.text: Had a great experience here. We tried the massive 100oz cocktail and it was really good.

6ExwUHt8In8l9kawnXLntw.text: Beerpong in Vegas sure why not ???????

photos.caption: Photo of PBR Rock Bar & Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States

tYjpCYwPGlu_IOLnTFLFFA.text: We 3 women friends stopped here to eat because the outside (with NO TV, people watching, and not dark like inside) looked inviting.  The were told there were not any tables, but we pointed out 2 empty tables nearby so we were "allowed" to sit at one of them.  Strange!  Our food was small portions (except for lots of fries) for a big price, but it's Vegas I guess.  I found a much better value and much better food later at Tacos & Tequila in the Luxor.  Our waiter Thomas A was great, but someone else brought out the food and there was a slight error (which was fixed).  Our check was all on one, when we had asked for separate checks, but we got it straightened out.

HS_-GK0PZcZK-f4YQea5Yw.text: Always stop by PBR during my visits to Vegas. Located in the Miracle Mile Shops on the strip. Had the PBR Burger, fries and a beer. Very satisfying as it was my first go-to spot arriving in Vegas.   Never too crowded, good service, good food, decent prices, TV's to watch games and big time sporting events. Glad PBR has stayed around for all these years.

MbnQZVl1TULIW62nTXAY2g.text: First time in Vegas, and this place was right next to the Cosmo. Good food, and really enjoyed their buy one get one free special when you check in on Yelp! Great deal, especially when getting drinks in Vegas can be expensive at times. I ended up going here both nights for food when I was there. Don't really remember the food, but the buffalo wings must have been good because we knocked out two orders of them.

eLl6b83yFDsxKu40gxM1lg.text: Fish & Chips were awesome.  Wife had the smoked brisket salad.  Also awesome.  Granddaughter had the kids chicken bites and fries.   They weren't like McNuggets that come from pink slime.   They were actual cut up white meat Breast.  Drinks were good and cold.  Especially the beer.   Great atmosphere.

WM9pSbuCU_z7SYtobgPjmw.text: Beautiful setting, I love this place. They have a outside and inside sitting. The bartenders was super nice to me. The food was excellent, the chicken fingers/tenders and pull pork sandwich was on point. I felt real comfortable and relax here. This place is simple but amazing. Whatever it is they do, they do it well.

photos.caption: Photo of PBR Rock Bar & Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Perfect! Pull pork sandwich with that coleslaw, Damn!
Photo of PBR Rock Bar & Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. I had a hang over and the chicken fingers/tenders did me right!

qS_jJ0vXjpzWQeJtJ_rl4Q.text: "I remember that night. You had like four daiquiris." -- Little Nicky (2000)  Have you ever had an entire yard of strawberry daiquiri? Yeah, entirely too sweet. But, also delicious. PBR rock bar, with an outside bar at the bottom/outside of Planet Hollywood hotel, has many sizes to buy of frozen cocktails.  A few things to note, however.  1) The tables are if you are eating only 2) Get a yard, super yard, Bull, Boot, Guitar, whatever and take it to go and walk the strip with it 3) Go inside, just past the hostess stand for more drink options - the bar only has two drink choices - inside there are 6 or 7 4) You can get additional shots added for cheap  The service at the outside bar was painfully slow - we waited an eternity to find out that they did not have the guitar we wanted, but we should go inside. But I went ahead and ordered since they had a purple yard for me. Little did I know they had better flavors inside.  Lesson learned.  So after I got my drink and went inside to find my friend, I realized the additional flavors. The staff was friendly and happy to offer additional shots to the guitar - 5 for $10, we think? Anyway, we declined and off we went with the guitar full of frozen goodness. 88 ounces is a LOT of sugary drink, but it certainly caused a lot of people to stop us along the strip.

photos.caption: Photo of PBR Rock Bar & Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Fender guitar full of frozen cocktail
Photo of PBR Rock Bar & Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The fillable guitar - 7 drink varieties, 88 ounces.

7NQj2Gncfdw64zU2RTejSQ.text: Service was slow. Sat for more than five minutes before server came over and they weren't that busy. Food was cold. The hand cut fries were soggy and cold. The potato salad had no flavor. I've been to PBR's in other cities and they were good.

LrBf-LmiUqL2VS22gcPemw.text: Omg! Don't go here on a weekeend night! The place was packed, so loud we couldnt talk; which might be good for some, poor service! Unfriendly staff!  Sorry but hire more servers! Quite expensive ~ food mediocre.

xhZD_YIMkzrS9vHojdwqdQ.text: Came here for lunch on monday (our first full day in Vegas.) Decently priced, HH 2 for 1 drinks & our burgers were delicious! Plus Mac & cheese with Doritos on top!? Hangover heaven! Our servers were awesome and attentive. We will be back for sure next time!

n2co2LMI5OzAYZkYbylGLw.text: WOW!! best describes my meal at PBR.  Everyone Claims they are the best or are #1 in Vegas,These guys just did it! Great burgers 1/2lbs Angus burger ,Smoked pulled pork,Wings,Brisket Good drinks great place to eat people watch and you get your moneys worth.Friendly Staff Awesome atmosphere check it out and prove me wrong.  Cowboy UP.

8I1Q_AqnwIpSe8HW8v3yAA.text: I could not give a worse review. We had reservations for over a week and came in on time with our company party of 11. Within minutes of sitting down, our waitress came over with a horrible attitude. Several members of our party checked in on yelp to take advantage of the buy one get one free drinks and we were looking over our menus for food. The waitress' attitude went from horrible to nuclear and she began complaining even louder that it would take her 20 minutes to honor the yelp offer. Waters were not even served during 5 minutes of waiting further and we could see our waitress venting about us. Keep in mind we were there for less than 10 minutes at that point. We went directly to the manager to ask for a new waitress and after having to wait for a customer in front of us also complain for some unknown issue with their party, we decided to get up and leave. All 11 of us got up and walked out without having ordered one thing. Huge loss for PBR!!!! I have never seen such bad service and will never go back to any PBR... ever!

w1nDPPr4qJriPtDkMR0f7g.text: This review is based only on their yard margaritas. A group of friends and I came here late last night cause we couldn't find a fat Tuesday's and we were lazy to walk. Hahaha the girl that was serving us was stale and had an attitude. My boyfriend and I got the pina colada with 2 extra bicardi shots. First of all, the pina colada tasted gross. It didn't even taste like pina colada. It felt like I was drinking a glade plug in! That artificial sweet taste with a hint of lighter fluid after taste. I looked at it and wished I walked the extra few feet to go to fat Tuesday's. Plus, they charge 5 bucks for each extra shot, so my $17 margarita was $27!! And I watched her pour the bicardi into the margarita, it wasn't nearly two shots. The girl didn't even know what rum was. My boyfriend asked what rum she had besides bicardi and she just blurted out everything she had behind the counter with attitude. Wth. Fat Tuesday's extra shot is a $1!! Go there and save yourself from this place. The drinks represent the girls that work there, weak and gross.

uASEagfMNZtIn1iUrBoywA.text: Went here for drinks yesterday and boy was it a blast!!!!  You have so got to check out the rodeo!  I laughed so hard I was almost in tears!  This bar gets really busy, so try and get there early and check out the happy hour.    Try their frozen cocktails - yummy and strong - so be warned!!

bQuxjAKptrAaN5u8DQv2zw.text: Great spot to sit outside and watch the football games. Awesome bartender Meagan at the outside bar b

RbhtdVGXKHmWBO-FlAV4Xw.text: Good place to watch the game tonight, it's Monday night football!  Food was yummy, portions were good as well. Good drink specials, and the free blueberry Bacardi sample was yummy too. Ride a mechanical bull if you want :) I had the cheeseburger with potato salad, tasty.

photos.caption: Photo of PBR Rock Bar & Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Texas Brisket pizza
Photo of PBR Rock Bar & Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cheeseburger n potato salad

-gPKe7A8YMBDlKageLXZBw.text: Great food, loved the nachos! Good drinks and fun atmosphere. But it is way too loud for me, can't even hear people talk at your table. Service was decent, I think it was slow bc they were so busy.

4o3YQ8iRsuiyQ2-9Sbg9zA.text: We found this place walking the strip. Entering the Mall we were greeted by hostess and the sounds of people enjoying themselves. We were seated quickly and our server came to the table right away, who was a transplant from CA...too funny.   My wife got the Memphis Style BBQ pulled pork sandwich with potato salad and a Hurricane to wash it down with. I got the BBQ Burger which was juicy and a little spicy with the bottomless beer special. Service was great, food and portions definitely worth the price..!   We'll definitely be returning next time were in Vegas. BTW...lot's of TV's to watch any game that's showing. Enjoy......

dJyiJ5KcV008fbE9sgiopw.text: The service was slow and the food had definitely been sitting out for 15 minutes before it got to our table. I had the brisket sandwhich...I've had ice cubes with more flavor.

egbHY-Fth_jOmaJO_aSpTw.text: With a crew in tow that whined about being too sober, having to pee and needing to eat, I made the executive decision to stop at the PBR Rock Bar and Grill, because it was close, empty and...well...because I'm bossy...that's why.  The place was snoozeville, and there were maybe 15 people there, including the 6 of us and all the staff. The drinks were a little pricey, but it is the strip...whatcha gonna do? My friend and I ordered 2 top shelf drinks and a cheeseburger and fries to share. Total was about $40 after tip. The fries were good. The burger was (suprisingly) done well.   I was a little drunk, so I can't quite remember...but I think there was a mechanical bull inside, and a lounge type situation that seemed nice. The best part is the tempered glass filled personal gas powered fire pits in the middle of each bar table - this made it very convenient to toss fries, ice, straws and other things into it.  The highlight for me though, was the fact that there was a girl passed out in the stall next to me...wait, that wasn't the highlight....the highlight was when I told the very hot, toned, bronzed bouncer, he just grunted with irritation and sauntered right in...like it was a typical Friday night.   A prince in shining armor on Las Vegas Blvd.

A0_hZ9ulbKS8qV-nZNkqiw.text: First off - we sat outside...it was nice to sit at a table with a fire pit...pretty cool actually, and people watch.   Drinks - They are PRICEY! But then again everything on the strip IS. $12 for a drink...meh! Their Southern Hospitality is by far one of the yummiest drinks I've had. Tastes like sweet tea!   Food - we had appitizers. Their fried pickles were pretty good. But their sampler is $20 and you get a TON of food for $20.   The mechanical bull is pretty neat. Costs $5 though. If you eat/drink there you should get to ride it for free, I say.   Service...it's okay. It's slow and the last night we were there the server pissed my husband off. We were told we could sit at a table by the hostess and the server wanted to move us to a "better table". Uh, okay. Bye.

EzY6g4dE6kJlim_3jGGGdg.text: Possibly the worst customer service orientation I have seen in Las Vegas. we we invited to join a table of four and, though there was plenty of capacity in the venue, apparently there was no possible way to accommodate this. Then, after we were seated separately within shouting distance, we were told it was not possible for one table to buy drinks for another table as they were "different sections". It could have been lazy service but, since the rest of the service was pretty good if not great, I suspect it is management. Too many good places in Vegas, skip this one!

CLhiqd1oIXptzl34IsBtlg.text: Get a pina colada with an shot of Bacardi to make it strong enough. Ask for Tiffany she's awesome!

AZ_MxzOTjLmhsUtK49YNoQ.text: We went late at night so it was about a 15 minute wait to get seated but that was just fine. You end of gambling or strolling around the casino for a bit so it ran by quick.   It was a noisy place because of all the music (And for being a rockbar..country music was the last thing I was planning to hear.  The service was fast, and food was just perfect. Only thing I didn't like was the silverware in the glass jar..I didn't know if it was used or what was going on there. There was 2 knifes and a fork in the jar and I was with a friend so that wasn't going to work lol.   When the server came back around I asked for extra silverware and she starts looking in the jar. I guess she thought they had enough in there but they didn't so she had someone come around and give us extra.   The prices are good for the amount of food they give you and it tastes wonderful. Great place to hang with a bunch of friends.

ntIgWVUSSCghG1u0UJNkQw.text: The True American experience!!! Food is awesome, drinks are too pricey. They have a concert often at night, and the best thing ever they have a mechanic bull and believe me you get your money's worth watching people (or jumping on it like I did)

5BHbGTLa3LzYDvp9Av-DIA.text: Me and my fiance were recently in Vegas for a weekend and stopped by PBR to drink out the last day before our flight.  Our waitress, Heather, was amazing and suggested the most fabulous drinks!  We even left a recent purchase there when we left and didn't realize until 2 hours later (blame it on the fab drinks!) and they had it at the server station waiting for us - we were impressed! Love this place, will be back! Thanks Heather!

XUXa5s65PfkORmAdHmcWYg.text: Like the atmosphere, but all the food is comfort food and is decent.  The buffalo wings were really good though.  Drink prices are expensive.  Lots of people riding the bull.  They have a outside patio which is nice.

f5JXIKC62og6oIO_-mmO3A.text: Timely service, American food.  This looks like a fun place for the evening crowd in Las Vegas.  We stopped in for a quick lunch bite after the girl on the sidewalk offered us 10% off our check.  It was early lunch in Las Vegas, so not much crowd.  The service was quick because of that.  However, a few things surprised us. Our waitress went on break, and another gal came by to check on us (This was a first after a week of eating out) They come by and take your photo, then offer it to you with a souvenir frame.  If you decline, the price WILL get cheaper.  They have a mechanical bull and a tire swing tied to the rafters if you are feeling brave.

TYNHK_Gv9hcdjMOwyhaEKA.text: my only reason for coming to this place was to get a green guitar filled with a blended drink for new years.   so, a few of us were on the strip around 6:30. the rest of the group wasnt gonna be around until 8:30, so we walked from cosmo to ph to grab a guitar. we stood at the daiquiri bar and waited maybe 5 minutes for anyone to even acknowledge we were there. mind you, it was still pretty early and wasnt really busy yet. one of the bartenders asks me what i want, i order a guitar, and ask if theres a green one (i got the last one!). i order the tropical (i think thats what i was called) one and decline the extra shot for $2 (it was still pretty early and i wanted to make it til midnight). she doesnt even card me! i had my card out and was waiting for her to ask me for it, but she didnt. (slightly insulted? yes. i'm 25 but i dont look it. and its NYE! i wonder who else she sold alcohol to...). i paid, i tasted it (it tasted like a big stick popsicle!), and i was stuck wearing this guitar all night.   needless to say, i've experienced better service. much rather go to fat tuesdays!!! and - i ended up getting annoyed with the damn thing and left it at chandelier bar.

gX-9H_YnHY-VZ7vh9fDisQ.text: The food was ok. I only ate here because I liked the bull outside. The food is pretty average. I had the pulled pork burger, it was a big burger.  It was a bit dry, so ask for more bbq sauce in the meat mix pls or add smothing saucy to it. The pancake was huge and yes its only 1 pancake. Staff were friendly. I might come back, but there are soooo many choice when you are here. So who knows when this will make it back to the top of the list.

EPpf-NM2iqLrHzECUi1Jlg.text: LOVED this place! We stopped in on a recent trip to Vegas as we wanted to watch a game. There were plenty of TVs, great atmosphere, great service! We'd g back in a heartbeat! Great low-key place with a great vibe!

ZcSrdMmznGax-86xSVPEbw.text: Good portions. Gumbo was pretty good. Better than Blondies and the Cheeseburger place in the same mall. Good value.

QqI79M19QURbPE9s7i8Vfg.text: huge place, small menu.. but great in portions!!.. got the chicken and waffles..came in a bucket! prices were reasonable.. my bf got the gumbo in which he said was very tasty!. would come back if we passed by it.. its known as a place for comfort food.. the place was really nice and modern.. had soo many tvs every where u look! waitress was very attentive too!

OAxC7MiUIspeCP8ow5qxhw.text: Awesome spot food is ok drinks are pricey but ok... The fried onion batter hotdog is great slaw had a funny taste to it. Great service

N7KREn6WphQiUWZcyu977g.text: The PBR Rock Bar and Grill serves up some of the best American comfort food you have ever seen. They have excellent food in great value portions that will definitely fill you up. They serve up a wide range of delicious food to keep your taste buds going. Dorito Mac & Cheese, Crispy Cutlet Pork Sandwhich, Fried Pickles, how can you go wrong!!!

2yMRWEF62rnkD1XymWRU-g.text: this place was awesome. Me and my girlfriend went here for their college night on a tuesday. We paid $5 for her and $10 for me for all you can drink from 9-12. All the bartenders were very friendly and kept the drinks coming as fast as we could drink them. We tipped a dollar after every drink and prolly had 25 between the two of us in 2 hours. We played beer pong and had a great night. This was a perfect place to go to on a tuesday night inside of our hotel.

F6DGpEg_pNROiYFnfl_jVw.text: i went there on Friday morning around 1 am. ordered the root beer float and the blossom onion burger the wife ordered the burger. everything was going well until the food poisoning a couple of hours later. thanks pbr for having me miss my brothers wedding and enjoying my trip.

XKuKNnQE_PnMSh23VOhw9w.text: went there for breakfast outside and sat by the street traffic.  it was great...good food and a wonderful waitress who i can't remember the name of!  we didn't look inside until we went into the mall and this place is HUGE!  went back later in the afternoon and had a beer outside again.  loved the place!

2Zq1s-GE6nolO-jj4tWArw.text: i had a bloody mary, and the reuben sandwich with potato salad. everything was pretty mediocre but i feel like that is the case with a lot of the similar restaurants on the strip. service was reallllly slow but to their credit, the restaurant was packed and it was right around lunch time.

JrsY2qMUDnOC1YA7LMwbSA.text: Ok so I went to this place on a bar crawl & the atmosphere is killer cool. Got a couple drinks & they were good. Mechanical bull was entertaining as hell & the FINEST woman was there working the bull. That will always be the night I fell in love from the across the room & when she kissed me on the cheek for a pic

bOqg8Tn_ufZIoAsKhqFsNw.text: Another place we visited during our anniversary getaway in Vegas a few months ago. This was the first place we visited as soon as we landed. I never had wings as good as the one this place provides. All I know is that they were fried, dipped in cheese sauce, and sprinkled with Doritos bits all over. We fell in love with this place.

photos.caption: Photo of PBR Rock Bar & Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of PBR Rock Bar & Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of PBR Rock Bar & Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Efe2L3UVSBwVZKHgx3MT-g.text: Came here for a late Thanksgiving lunch. I ordered the House Strawberry Spinach Salad with added chicken for takeout. I was impressed as the  chicken was juicy and moist. I would have given 5 stars, but it was too loud for me to sit in there.

lX9BdeBktFqOu4LX4I7Ryg.text: I ordered the Southern Fried Chicken Salad with honey mustard dressing and it was delicious! Comes in a half size or full size. I recommend it We did the outside seating and I didn't get to go inside and explore the bull ride because we were in a rush but I will probably come back for that :)

4ST1BSve5Ms3JjwfzBY5lw.text: Good American Bar food (my favorite) at a reasonable price. The food itself was decent,not spectacular. I prefer my fried pickles in chips instead of spears but hey its all preference. Chili tater tots were pretty good, French fries are good. Server was really nice ans low pressure. He let us sample the drink flavors before we got a souvenir drink and was helpful/efficient. All in all, a good spot right on the strip that wasn't too crowded!

photos.caption: Photo of PBR Rock Bar & Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States

D62vcIazA-oTZEJn9Zp1vw.text: Visited this location while in Vegas on business. We wanted to stop for some late dinner grub.  We ordered the bucking bull frys. They were good not as hot or spicy as I was expecting. The chili cheese taters on the other hand were actually spicier than the bull frys. The chili cheese taters were good with plenty of chili. They are not for those light of heart or counting calories. Those have got to be 2000 calories alone lol. There are enough for at least two adults to share easy.   The BBQ hamburger was cooked very well. Served with a perfect medium pink through out. It was a good meal even for bar food. My co-workers had various foods they all enjoyed including potato salad, other burgers, and chicken sandwiches.  The location is loud for sure its a country bar so understand that up front. We sat in the restaurant area to eat. There is a bar side with karaoke and open floor area were people danced.   The server was great full of personality and made good recommendations on the food.   Overall not a bad place to stop in for a bar food night.

smDsetYYyGGhJdDNLHni_A.text: Horrible chairs at the bar. Like only fat people sit here. Carol the Bartender was nice. Brisket sandwich was bland and aus jus was salty.  Not a good combo. Tater tots were right out of an elementary school cafeteria. Not a great experience. Will not be going back. You should not go either

yvD1drHc6NWR0fE1cZQINg.text: Anna at your inside bar Friday night was amazing!  She made a killer food suggestion... She said try the blackened Alfredo and it was awesome.... I had a great night...left work early and just wanted a mellow chill eve and a cocktail and i am so glad she suggested dinner....so hit the spot and I had left overs to take home and enjoy later.....and Brandon the manager even stopped by to ask if my meal was prepared right and if I was satisfied.... Great customer service!!!

TN0uyB4lNLMBd2rJKvAs7A.text: This place is cheap ass...they lied to that they don't have titos vodka for my free drink and gave titos to guy standing next to me. Not worth it

_eOCF5AwZnDqZbg5Xh7bpA.text: Fantastic for what it is!  Perfect for brunch.   Hungry for brunch - hung over!?  Get the egg sandwich. Egg cheese. Ham. Sausage. Bacon  on two waffles with syrup.   The pulled pork is also amazing and they have great bloodies

pjJa6ulGMMJjUiZy_rmwgQ.text: Stopped in on a Tuesday night, mainly because everywhere else had a line. Quickly seated and served. Had the triple turkey club and my son had the PBR burger. Average club. Turkey was a bit dry but the sauce was great. Fries are fantastic. Burger was top notch. Really tasty. Nice place, great service.

0loChBLzdOCiA3Q_OC4oKw.text: Look, anyone who had a problem with the prices needs to remind themselves of where they are.  Most of the strip is an expensive place, and you need to adjust your food price meter accordingly.  I've found everything costs about $5-$7 more than it does anywhere else.  My problem with PBR was the food and service...which is too bad given those are sort of biggies at a restaurant.  Sat outside in the lovely little patio right next to the entrance to the Miracle Mile Shops...great people watching.  Got a table quickly and all was well.  Server wasn't unfriendly, you could just tell he didn't care, at all.  We all have bad days, but the indifference was almost insulting.  Out of three meals, one was good (chicken and waffles), one was meh but okay (chipotle chicken sandwich), and one was awful (chicken mac and cheese)...it was a big bowl of mac and cheese soup...so watery my poor wife needed a spoon.  It's dishes like that which make you question if whoever is in the kitchen really cares.  PBR has the total right to serve that nonsense, but we for sure have the right to choose to not come back.  On the whole the mediocre food and indifferent waiter overweighed the great location and patio.

jBxn4syC9ZVPNBDv5UBNTw.text: Gin and juice bowl was worth the $65. Chicken fingers and fries were delicious. Our waiter Kevin was super helpful and on the money. Worth stopping in even if it's just for happy hour. And there's live music!

JuOwxkS2Xrosvtie4N-36w.text: Good food on the Vegas Strip. Prices are about the normal price range for Vegas...too much but unfortunately the norm for the area.

pDTJRKPVuDKmLvCwqbEf-A.text: Great burgers and great service, we sat outside and our server was Rome he is so genuine, and friendly. I ordered something that I didn't like he did not even hesitate to take it back and put in a rush order. Awesome guy

photos.caption: Photo of PBR Rock Bar & Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. BBQ Burger

OVdOoHtgSH5GPCi2lhQKqg.text: Food was EH. Drinks were EH. Service was EH. Plenty places along the strip that are much better.

53R2zFnbJb9tHZnf5uFEMQ.text: Bought a package deal with dinner and the V Variety show (which was awesome ). Had 2 choices for dinner and I picked PBR Rockgrill, BIG MISTAKE! It was horrible all around. First off not a big sports fan and there was a game going with a lot of loud rowdy people (who offers a sports bar to theater people? I'm from outta town I'm thinking rock bar will be similar to Hard Rock Cafe). It was so loud in there couldn't even talk to each other. Then as part of the deal our choices were EXTREMELY  limited. We had our choice of salad, salad veggies salad or ribs. I got a cesar salad and they gave me a side since my other option was salad. I picked deviled eggs thinking I  could add them to my salad. But they were hard and tasteless. That was definitely not a cesar dressing it was horrible and the croutons were hard and chewy. Then for dessert we picked strawberry shortcake. It was an old store bought donut cut in half with canned strawberries and whipped cream. HORRIBLE!!!! I would never go back there and never recommend it to anyone. Save your money and your taste buds!

594IEYrWwkMU2cyoXzfV-w.text: Had the chicken mac and cheese.  I was super disappointed.  The Mac and cheese was soupy and lacked seasoning.  The chicken looked like it was cooked on a foreman grill.  I did have a double shot of knob creek, which was good but pricey.

9gyT3c7Z5O8X9Uwais3uaQ.text: So it's 9pm, we have just come out of a show, and we have not eaten lunch that day. I was HANGRY! I'd had my first full day in Vegas and was craving a spot to eat that wasn't inside under a fake sky. We wandered down the strip, my feet getting sorer and sorer in heels, and we spotted the PBR Rock Bar & Grill. I thought there's a patio, I can hear some good music and there are empty tables, DONE! We sat and waited, waited, waited... no service. So my mother pops up and goes to the bar, thinking she'd order us a couple of drinks and some water (we were real thirsty, 24 hours of air travel the day before will do that). They told her that she had to sit down and wait for a server. We could actually see people going up to the bar and being served, but apparently we were in a service area. So we kept waiting. Still nothing. At this point I was close to hysteria. I'd had about 10 hours sleep in the last three days and I was hungry and thirsty, these things are not a good combination. She went up again and was told "Ma'am please do not come to the bar again, someone will come to serve you." We were almost ready to walk about when a young guy came buy, bringing out someone else's food. We dragged him over and begged him to take our order. He said that he couldn't but thankfully he sent someone right over. FINALLY. Normally I'm pretty relaxed about this kind of thing, people are busy, they're doing the best they can, bar girl was just following the rules blah blah blah, but it should not be that hard to get a glass of water?  We couldn't decide on entrees so ordered a bunch of sides, the corn was awful, but the macaroni and cheese with doritos was super delicious, mashed potato wasn't hot enough, coleslaw was just coleslaw from a packet. Beers were big and well priced. All in all it's not like I wouldn't come in here for a beer and some french fries if I was back in Vegas and was walking  by but it does not bring good feelings to mind when I reflect on this particular encounter...

mBo7JqLABYDnkEKyT4BYFw.text: Great breakfast. Both my wife and I shared a breakfast pizza and it was delicious. The $12 watermelon drink called Hat Bender was also good. My wife ordered that and I tried a little.   Our server Dieago was a super nice and friendly guy. He's the one that recommend the pizza and drink.  Nothing bad to say and I would return again.

nUDgj6KmMFq0RDCFYEJf0w.text: This was by far the worst meal I had the whole week I was in vegas...they didn't offer most of the food their online menu showed saying they just opened...the food we did order off the limited menu was horrible, chicken strips that were smaller than popcorn bites and overcooked to a teeth cracking level, a sausage patty that was more like a hockey puck the English muffin was soggy with grease to where I couldn't even eat it, also breaded fish that was 90% breading 1% fish...don't waste your money

e08aBKXtjQY26Pqf28vP6Q.text: We took advantage of their outside bar dining on a Saturday night. They had a great band playing. The pizza wasn't that great but I'm giving them 4 stars for the atmosphere and the service. I wish I could remember our server's name so I could give her a shout out. She did a phenomenal job and our hostess was very prompt as well. Service overall was quick without feeling rushed. I would definitely come back and try something different off the menu simply because of the service we received on a busy Saturday night.

KcY2tUBwZ3mPMqenLhwUgA.text: One of my favorite bars on the Strip. I'm not much of a "clubber" so this place really fits the bill when I've had too much casino and need an enjoyable way to spend the night. The food here is alright; the bucket of wings and tater tots are pretty good as far as finger foods go and reasonably priced considering the prime location.  However, what really appeals to me about PBR Rock Bar are the drink specials, which in my experience are unparalleled on the Strip. They have a different special every night, but I think your best bet is to try and get there for an open bar. Wednesday is open bar for college students (although I think you can still do it for a slightly higher price if you're not a college student) and Sunday night is $10 open bar just for following them on Twitter. You can't beat it!  Oh, and once you've had a few, make sure to ride the bull. If you've ordered food, your receipt gives you a complimentary ride.

O6Mu3EMzibuuNGmXyGTPag.text: We had a wonderful time here on New Year's Day!  We scouted this out ahead of time as a place where we could enjoy the Citrus Bowl game.  Everybody was very accommodating about our seats and choice of tv channels.  The food was really good - we had breakfast as well as  several  Mimosas!  The coffee was really good too.  All in all, we had a great experience!

nAQudWTveXX8McBSSNpcuw.text: Came here Sunday to eat lunch and watch football. While I understood it was busy because everyone was watching the game the fact that multiple tables were left open for over a half hour did not make any sense. My husband I brought this up to the three hostess in the front, who were too busy gossiping to do their job, to only be told that because we were only two people we had to wait till a two person table opened up!!! At that point I lost my patience and asked to speak to a manager who had us sat right away but definitely had no customer service skills and she should not be a manager. The only saving thing was our server who was absolutely amazing and wish that I would have remembered her name. Food was decent nothing to brag about. Overall, won't be coming back here.

zD16sPV8owU9RsnImgQOsA.text: Gone to this place a couple of times. Love the concept. The strip needs places that are easy, fun, rockin' etc. Unfortunately, I can't recommend. Service was atrocious on all occasions. Arrived both times to have drinks and were shown where to sit, and waited at least 15 minutes. First time we managed to flag down a waitress, second time we left. The place could be a lot of fun, and create a great vibe. Unfortunately, their indifference to customers will forever prevent that from happening.

Dz6bvr1sMxv-JYNgOhVAhw.text: This place is perfect for those times in Vegas when you're stumbling around, just about on empty, and you could use a beer and a shot to get your night going again. They've got some tasty $5 shots, and beers are as low as $3. I think. Don't quote me on that. My prior statements clearly indicate that attention to detail is likely at a low during those times.

UAwpszHD5BbFOrwEDjtAwQ.text: Decided to stop here right for a light bite and a beer, went straight to bar sitting.  I walked in with one objective a nice juicy burger and a nice cold beer!  Placed my order and result was sad, I was expecting that delicious $20 burger, I felt it was a bit over cooked, this didn't taste much different from Carl's Jr but I did pay 12.95 for it.... added avocado n a bud light.... I could hv used another beer but it took the bartender Karisa a whole lot of time to come back and check on me, unbelievable as I was sitting right at the bar n it wasn't even busy, it was only 6pm.  PS. Bummer! I should hv read my receipt before leaving the place, I could hv redeemed it for a free bull ride!

photos.caption: Photo of PBR Rock Bar & Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States

zAU1ngJGS-briPBgrspKmA.text: Went on a Monday night for free entry and $25 for all you can drink, which was a fantastic deal.  We also tried beer pong, which was fun but being from Britain we don't play often and got eliminated first.  The bar service was very quick and friendly, and we managed to drink plenty until closing time.  This was on a Monday night though, and therefore it was quieter.

LecDFP7pcMLsHx7TbQpYiw.text: Its like we all know PBR is not that good of beer but this place is a pretty cool spot to chill. There is alot of stuff happening around you and There chicken waffles seemed like a good size portion.

ujXMijwdw954lWfncBlfIw.text: The rocking bull fries are a satisfying buzz food!!! Drinks are a little on the pricy side but it is Vegas so I'm not surprised! Riding the bull was fun!! And excellent DJ choices every time we have went!!

gGdsGMeL8MdC5J3-QVZE5g.text: Stopped by for their $5 shots a few times.  LOVE the $5 Cherry Bombs.  Didn't get anything to eat, but I would try it for food next time.   I thought the ladies serving booze were fun.. Even blew a whistle when we took our shots that made it seem more exciting and Vegas-like.

IaFGdLd4kNzYmFNAk2QNzg.text: We had an open table reservation on an off Sunday. When we arrived they didn't honor the reservation. I wouldn't recommend this restaurant to anyone.

q1KxFZd-mbsIh-EupQRSrw.text: Beers and Bulls!  What happens when you take drunk girls in hooker dresses and mount them on a mechanical bull?  Hilarity ensues, along with pantie shots.  Oh, and you don't have to walk through the casino to take a leak, cause the pisser (that's how cowboys say bathroom) is right there inside the bar!

tt6rjsMFUPajBQLpd-AnVw.text: That' an awesome place to having fun. You can chill outside the terrace or go inside with great music, a bar and beerpong tables. As we spent our times we go several times to PBR.   The food is very good and they serve a wide choice of diffrent meals. (Burgers, pizza, wings and ribs). Staff was always friendly and helpful.   I can hardly recommand this place. You can have lunch or dinner, go for a good pre-party or just chill outside and looking at the strip. We will definatly turn back here asap. ;)

rMF08MgXwmiUYvwJyMZuuQ.text: My husband and I ate here our first night of our honeymoon in Vegas (my first visit)! We stayed at the Aria and this was a very convenient location on the strip! We have friends that come to Vegas annually and had recommended we try here, as it is one of their favorites! After we were seated outside, it did take a little while before we were served, but that was due to the volume of people being there and I think the hostess forgot to tell servers there were people outside :) but after she told servers, the service was VERY attentive and great! The atmosphere outside was great! My husband had the chili dog and he is a chili god snob and he said it was absolutely phenomenal! Also, FANTASTIC fries!! I had the potato skins for my dinner and oh my word!! They were some of the best I've ever had! Great place to eat, we will definitely return! Thanks!

tgV9stPYM1VF5NJ7hq65sQ.text: Really great service, amazing food, and very reasonably priced for being on the strip. Our waitress was very sweet (I wish I could remember her name), and the BBQ burger with a side of potato salad was delicious. All of our meals were under $20, as well. We also got to ride the bull which was a ton of fun! Our waitress gave us a couple of vouchers to ride it, so we didn't even have to pay. I would highly recommend this restaurant over the overpriced, not so great restaurants that are so common on the strip.

B4wSadMk3Km5OCYjE6MKrA.text: The food probably tastes better after a few drinks. My steak was overlooked, spinach had too much raw garlic in it  and onion strings were greasy. They get a star because the server was nice.

CGogZi78UGMjYXcuaQPPQA.text: First time coming to this place two years ago was okay, but went there again for our second time this  weekend  while in vegas for some drinks and appetizers and we enjoyed our time there. Service was quick and my mojito tasted perfect. My boyfriend and I still can't get over how delicious the buffalo wings were! So juicy and tasty! Our waitress was upbeat and friendly.

6WAOL4xxj23B8Xq15B751w.text: Female bartender at the rock bar was makinh racists jokes and comments about all the foreign customers here for rugby. She acted like the bar was close and would not serve any foreigners. No wonder this place was dead. Horrible customer service.

lekXW6mBIYMbv0cgZQku-w.text: This meal started off prettttyy rocky...  so our 2 friends went in before us and asked for a table for 6.. we were nearby at another store and our friends called and said we got a table but we have to come asap. so we ran over... (maybs ~5 mins) and when we got there they were sitting at this smallll table for 2 and they told us the hostess gave the booth away and we have to go up to the hostess and get in line all over again. so i went to the hostess and she had a major attitute she was like you guys weren't here so you have to go to the back of the line so we'll get seated after everyone else there (there's like 3 parties).. I was fine with that since we were late and it's pretty busy today so we went back to the small table to wait but within 5 minutes we got asked to move because we were standing over the table.... (we were by the wall so it wasn't like we were blocking anything) AND THIS IS A BAR!!! there's a mechanical bull behind us which made me think this was a casual place... but apparently not... so we moved outside (we considered leaving but it was dinner time and our friends wanted to watch the game so we just stuck around) finally all the parites got seated and then I saw a party leave from the booth so I went to the hostess and asked if we can take that table. she said it was okay. the place was really crowded so we just went over to the table and hooovered around it. soon this waitress came over and was like this table is not cleaned yet you guys need to step outside. she had a REALLY nasty attitude and she even went to the hostess to tell on us. I told the hostess oh I thought you said we can have the table so we just walked over to wait... (we've already waited like 45 mins by now) and we wanted to watch the game and we can't if we're standing outside. (plus there was someone riding the bull and we wanted to watch that too)... but we were like fine... so we stepped out and we were watching the table to see when it'll get cleaned so we Patiently waited.... and then BAM! i see another party walk in and sat on the table. I was like WTF?? so i went to the waitress that told us to leave and I was like i thought u guys said you can't sit down until it was cleaned? these people just walked in and sat down.... at our table.... and the waitress was like OH this isn't my job, you'll have ot ask the hostess (again.. very nasty attitude) I was like so you tell us to leave and then when another party comes in that you like you let them sit (she was their waitress... so obviously she just didn't want to serve us so she made us leave with this bullshit excuses) (also note... they DID NOT clean the table until after those people sat down)... really wanted to leave right about now but my friends already got drinks from the bar and they had money betting on the game and it was mid-quarter so they werent about to leave. FINALLY... we got seated... Our waiter was really nice and the food was good too. I had the chicken and waffle... other than the rocky start... the rest of the experience was good. the game went well and my friends won money from it. the mechanical bull was fun to watch. overall environment and vibe at the bar was casual and fun. food was okay but just your typical bar food.   If the hostess/waitress thing didn't happen, i would've given it a 3 star...

8tXpH53oKCQnH1gootf0CA.text: In the words of the late, great, Colonel Sanders, "I'm too drunk to taste this chicken."

T5PUmABXTS7JgTWOmGir3w.text: Just went here last night... I liked the atmosphere, and the bbq chicken pizza was delicious :) It was pretty big too! My 2 friends and I ordered the bbq pizza and shared it. The service was great, the food was good... cant complain. I kinda wanted to sit outside but it was cold since we went at night, but maybe next time I'll check it out during the day so I can sit outside and enjoy some sunlight. Dont expect too much though, they have a small menu so you really dont have too much to choose from, but it comes in a big portion. We saw someone order some burger, and it was huge. I'll be coming back for that bbq chicken though. It was good stuff!

2_S59UGQu3_0MSlOZgL-Pw.text: Bar and restaurant that serves classic American food, a stage for live performances, a mechanical bull and flat screen televisions.

KWtvhRznsWSsKYiEpIzApQ.text: I didn't feel well after eating here but it might have been some heat related illness. Service was fine but other servers were being hit on and groped to the point that it was distracting and unappetizing. Drink wasn't that great either.

SmzgFsP1mf6c28YRnEWMaQ.text: Surprisingly good. Good wait staff. Chicken and waffles is a winner.

2riF5Fv8jjLWlrmVjatdvQ.text: About as mediocre as you can get.  Mechanical bull/ sports bar/ loud music/ etc.  Bland, boring American cuisine.  There are plenty of better options in Las Vegas.

AQ_gA_AFHFi7FHtNgfohrA.text: Really nice food, good atmosphere but the service can be a bit hit and miss.

y7OlTuCfSWCadW8suR1Dzg.text: Three orders of chicken fingers and 3 of the worst orders of chicken fingers my family has had in their lives.  Tasted like corn meal fish.  Disgusting.  Will never come back and with a manager who argues about the quality.   I will tell everyone never to eat here

kXFvvNljITUVHOqF5Gk4CQ.text: I'd give this place no stars if I could..   Went for breakfast (they advertise serving breakfast ALL DAY - for real - look at their ad).   My server sauntered over to me to get my order while cradling her glass of orange juice and sipping as she noted my order.  NICE.  Then I proceeded to wait and wait and wait.  I had ordered the steak and eggs.   At least two other parties were seated and ate after me.  25 minutes later - I flagged another server (since mine hadn't checked on me) and asked him to give me the check.  I had enough.  My actual server came and I told her again to get me the check.    10 minutes later the manager came with my plate.    At that point - with my pride and principles - I couldn't touch the food if they paid ME.    The manager apologized and explained that her cook did this to her yesterday too.   Nice to hear I waved and walked out across the way to grab something from Earl of Sandwich.   Had my order in 7 minutes.

gdnvjiSJgANv2oiEgKYNYw.text: Great happy hour deals. I love the boneless buffalo chicken!  Beer prices are reasonable for Vegas. Awesome people watching outdoor seating area. We frequent this place whenever in Vegas.

cWaSXnJh3ED6pEKDFM_vnA.text: My husband and I went here this weekend we just randomly picked a place. We chose it because we wanted to sit outside and people watch and it was a perfect place for it! First of all we asked for ice tea we got like literally three pieces of ice each which in Vegas melts in two seconds so warm ICE tea. After that our waiter took our order. We ordered a couple of burgers I got a turkey burger it was pretty good. My husband got a PBR burger asked for meat and cheese only also a side of BBQ he got a burger patty with cheese and no bacon which comes on it, the waiter who we hadn't seen for a while (our food got delivered by another waiter) could not be found so we asked another waiter who was helping someone else close by about the bacon as we were in the middle of asking the other waiter comes up all abruptly and says that's what you ordered. Yes he did order meat and cheese only but bacon is meat right? Also my burger was suppose to come with avocado and it did not have it and he forgot the BBQ sauce. At this point he blames it on the kitchen and goes and gets bacon and avocado from the back and brings it to us. Now his burger is cold and stale and the waiter just dumps the bacon it and leaves. I only gave two stars because of the location I would never eat here again.

KE4osU5e3li5dLdgLSwdJg.text: I've been to vegas a million times but never really ate at one of the places on the strip.  This past time my friend and i were walking the strip and picked this place bc we were starving, and didnt really want to walk around anymore.  what a good pick it was.  I think he had a pulled pork sandwich.  I had the country fried chicken sliders.  everything was delicious.  from the first bite of the biscuits to the last bite of the fries.  and the prices werent bad either.  plus they had a mechanical bull.  that was unexpected, and entertaining to watch as always.

n9rR64gUjrZSsfVhUesK0g.text: We stopped by on Thursday night for a drink, we got a perfect spot on the patio at the bog circle table. As the guests were leaving one of them said "If you want service, you should go to another bar" We just sat sown anyway...for 10 minutes and not 1 person talked to us or even said that they will be right with us. Only 1 guy came and cleared the table. We sat for 10 minutes and then left. 4 people that worked there saw us leave but didn't say anything. Oh well their loss it was my sisters 30 bday and we were ready to party!

W4wsNEky7yZioYkJK3xRwQ.text: We loved it. Food was great and drinks were good. The server was quick and nice. Good view and the fire pit tables were cool. We will be back.

wanhBwfI53RJUhE7mqq-9g.text: I can't even give this place one star but I had to in order to leave a review.  I'm not one to leave reviews but I felt I had to for this one.  We were there some time ago, and it was awful.  Service...terrible. Food...even worse.  Our waitress disappeared several times and there were empty tables so it's not like she was busy.  We ordered chicken wings as an appetizer.  Not sure what we were thinking since we are from Buffalo.  They were rubbery.  There were 4 of us and ALL of us got sick from them.  That was the only thing that we all shared.  I had 1 wing (yes 1) and I'm pretty sure I ended up with salmonella poisoning.  It ruined the rest of my trip.  I will never go there again.

zOu95oLsI3JMKzuFmRHmYg.text: Myself and six of my friends were drinking outside where we received god aweful service from a bartender named Lisa.  She was beyond rude and is the slowest bartender I have ever had to deal with in Vegas.  We came here to have a good time not deal with this bartenders drama.  If your in Vegas yes they have huge frozen drinks but I would skip it there are so many other places that have great service and this is not one of them

RzpSZW174UckgCmaNaGL1Q.text: Really small but can't complain with open bar for $10. I think it's every tuesdays and man they make the drinks strong. The place probably had a capacity of about 80 people. There is a spot for bp with two tables and a dance area that's about 8x10.   The crowd ranges from college kids to midlife crisis OC moms and dads. Very diverse but everyone seemed to get along and do their own thing. We were pretty much there to pregame and replenish spending about an hour there. The open bar was from 9-1 with re-entry. A good idea is to drink at PBR and club upstairs at the Gallery if you're looking to dance or listen to music with a legit sound system.  This place deserves more credit for their amazing deals but overall not a place I'd be hanging out at on a regular basis

YZqZk-8pB9h7W6cSrox2HQ.text: F this place. Just got to Vegas for the first time, so my friends and I were vey excited for our first meal and beer after the long plane ride.  The outdoor seating was appealing, and we were just looking for an easy lunch.  There were a few tables visibly available, but there was the hostess had no idea what was going on.  We stood there for 10 minutes, but it was clear this place was so unorganized. I wish we turned  back at that point.    A server didn't approach us for at least 20 minutes. When she did, she didn't apologize for the wait, and was quite rude. The four of us each got a beer, and ordered immediately because it had taken so long already. She forgot half our drinks, which literally took another 20 minutes.  The food took 40 minutes to come out.  Of course, my plate had a 6-inch black curly hair on half of my plate, which was the icing on the plate.  The waitress saw me look in disgust, and it was impossible to miss as it was on top of my eggs/bacon.  I normally don't send back, but I really wanted to.  However, I did not because we would have still been there. So I took one for the team, kept my plate, and ate about 2 bites as I instantly lost my appetite even though I was ravenous.  So yeah- 2 hours, awful service, awful food, and a nice big long hair in my food.  Avoid at all costs. Worst place ever.

p8ooCD4oDHCnYRbeONmMeg.text: This place is awful, the service is horrendous and there is a huge lack of management. It took forever to get served our food, then two fo the food orders were missing which we had to wait another 10 minutes for. To start off our lunch, one of the bus boys spill BBQ sauce all over me and another one of my friends. Then just walked away!! It took 15 min just to find the manager in order to tell her what had happened and to make up for what had happened she gave me a drink....... To top off the horrific experience i just checked my bank statement and was charged double the amount!!! Don't ever go to this restaurant, everything about it is awful!

As1RVhhnIoizo2EBI4YZqA.text: The only good thing about this place was the bucket of beer... And the bull. Do not eat the food. Yuck.

aFP_xRd0rUp46O2Y-VO86g.text: Music was great! It's an average American style food. I had waffles with fried chicken. Surprisingly, the chicken wasn't dry. We also ordered Sloppy Joe's sliders and a few more items. Our server was friendly, but the orders took a long time. Just for an added fun, they had a mechanical bull-ride contest on the other side of the restaurant and tons of flat screen televisions side by side throughout the restaurant!

E78MFwzyd-AaBV187Oqpxw.text: On March 26, 2014 my daughter and I decided To go to this restaurant. At first they seated us near the door that exits to the blvd. But my daughter asked if we could be moved because I had surgery on my neck only a week before and it was too much air on me. Politely they moved us to another table. Our waitress came and introduced herself and took our drink order. I hope that this receipt is correct it says Allison H. Because she deserves all her accolades. I am a 55 years old other of 4 grandmother of 7. I have been to a lot of restaurants in my life all over the entire United States of America. When I tell you she was the best server I have ever had. Thoughtful, speedy, she listened, she didn't drop and run.  We ordered the Spinach dip, she explained that it came with  potatoe chips and not tortilla chips like at other restaurants. She said they were good and they sure were. My daughter mumbled that they would be some good vinegar and salt chips. Allison brought my daughter some vinegar. She was listening. She went way way beyond the call of duty. The most important thing to me was that she listened. She made sure our drinks were filled on time. We both had turkey burgers. Awesome.  Ask for Allison H. She is the best!

wKmcbv-EOxzKSK-fXkY2KQ.text: This is a regular stop for great food when visiting from Florida - breakfast, lunch or dinner! Fresh, quality menu. Nice atmosphere and fun music!

cdQPgQzr72CpTvpY8qBVhA.text: Two stars for the food. Good portions good bar food. Service at the bar?? Bad bad bad. Was very slow. Girls paid more attention to bitching about customers amongs themselves than actually trying to earn a tip.

d1MQW0gbzwBjzbWIkpkm4A.text: Me and my friends met here. Was not really crowded on a Saturday night. Spent most of my time at the bar. Bartenders were friendly and attentive. Drink was decent. Food was ok. Nothing spectacular about it. Good place to meet up but wouldn't spend my entire night here.

H4eYmJAy-2gYdjJkYoyYlg.text: My work is close by, so my coworkers and I decided to order lunch from here the other day. I called it in and was quoted 20 minutes as my wait time. 25 minutes later I show up there and nobody knows anything about any order to pick up. The host directed me to a bartender, the bartender directed me back to the host. Both question me about who took my order, unfortunately I didn't remember her name but they made it pretty obvious that was more important to them than a solution to the problem. The two of them actually started arguing right in front of me about who took the order and whose job it was to do that. Then another girl comes up and tells me the order was never placed and it would be another twenty minutes from then. I told them to forget it and left. Well today I decided to try them out again. I called ahead to place my order and was quoted the 20 minute wait time. 20 minutes later I showed up and nobody had put my order in! Again! But this time the girl who took my call actually took full responsibility for it and put it in with a rush order. I did appreciate her accountability, but I doubt I'll be back for a while.

9cqSHN0r2H34A3QzBx0BNg.text: the service was so slow we discussed stiffing the waiter (would never).  the food (hot wings and chicken and waffles) was very good! so were our mind bender drinks.

oAOvzUsKw9pC_2VBHk6y5Q.text: So many TVs in here omg. I like the vibe and hey for a pub the food is good. Tuckey club and pulled pork going to hit the spot after a drink or two.

vpOfiEBkL-Yz_ZD-Wz8NIQ.text: Doesn't even deserve a star! Made a reservation for Super Bowl Sunday for a party of 8 (which means big $$$ to an owner or SMART manager). Our reservation was not honored because they never checked their open table account & confirm the day before for the $250 deposit. So glad I showed up 15 minutes before game time with no reservations. Been searching the rest of the casino for a table for 8. Now we have no where to watch other than our room. So glad we made the trip all the way out to Vegas from San Diego to watch the big game in our hotel room!!

N_cXXs3S-aNrMK9gImWKrQ.text: The chicken wings were amazing,chicken was lean and so fresh tasting. Fast and friendly service.

UNojRlsNJ2S_CTE2zaO7zg.text: Walking by the outside seating area after we'd already eaten breakfast elsewhere, we stopped to check out the menu. The outside hostess, CrystaLyn, came over to ask if we had any questions. She spent several minutes with us discussing the menu highlights and answering questions (I still can't wrap my head around chicken & waffles), her pride and enjoyment of working there came through so much we decided to go there for dinner that night. We sat outside, which was about 1/3 full, our wait person, Heather, was right with us for our drink orders and answers. She was personable and friendly. We asked about the morning hostess and she told us they were two of the staff that had been there from day one. You could tell how much Heather enjoyed PBR that this was not just a job for her she loves it. Beyond that our food was outstanding. Hubby had Chicken Caesar, lots of chicken and great dressing. I had BLT w/fried egg. Tons of bacon cooked to perfection, the egg was cooked perfect over hard but not dried out. We also had the deep fried pickles, one of our fav appetizers, and these were the best we've ever had. Next time we're in Vegas this will be our go to place for food, not just for the food but the wonderful service we received. Thanks CrystaLyn and Heather.

tz95eQef175Hw3c31YhLOg.text: This place rocks.  As good a sports bar as there is anywhere.  Lots of TV's, great bar scene, food is above average and the service is first rate.  You don't go there for gourmet meals, but for a sports bar, the food is well above average.  Lots of 20-30 something single girls, which truly makes this place a great sports bar.

FQD0I57jGLAE3zFi7VAhUQ.text: Yes, this place is good, my kid enjoyed making his own pizza.

yfnt-9sTQkRFmUKKi32FLg.text: $6 for two mini cheeseburger sliders and an abundant amount of freshly friend fries.

lwgc6owp-fEe-kISzWMDDQ.text: The food is good. Hamburgers are tasty but... when the waiter comes with the check and that he wrote "gratuity is not included" in big letters with 18 and 20% tips recommended on it, the fun was over. Ok I'm from France, I obviously have a french accent but I've been living in LV for 11 years. I know when to tip and how much. I thought it was kinda rude to assume I was a foreign tourist not knowing about tipping. It would have took two seconds to ask me where I was from and that's it. He ignored us. Too bad because like I said the place is kinda cool.

a2nOxPhS8fs_ZAOcngRDhQ.text: Located inside Planet Hollywood, this is a pretty cool place to grab a drink. I came here to pregame every day of the week during my business trip. Mondays are Ladies' Night. My coworker got $1 drinks but mine were $9. fail. Wednesdays are $8 all you can drink wrist bands before midnight, only $5 for girls. They have a cool outdoor patio which overlooks the Strip and CityCenter's new Cosmopolitan. I'd go just to enjoy the view! The crowd is alright here, hit and miss. I did meet some cool, young nurses, and some wonderful ladies on business trips. Cool place. Go and tip my girl  Kaylee!

AGwZnA9tygDlF2qLRm8odA.text: Food lacked taste, now I was drunk but I can still taste, sent my burger back and got something else, it tasted better.    Funny part about this place is, my burger tasted like shit, they offer to take it off and ask me if I want something else, I say no.  She says let me make it up to you, so I say ok get me XXX, she does and it's on the bill.  How is that making up for it?   D

2bq5DuGaCgkI4LW7HbqKaQ.text: PBR Rock Bar is your typical sports bar type place.  You know..catchy top 40 tunes, waitresses dressed like strippers, overpriced drinks ($12.00 margaritas WTF!) and tons of burgers and other Amerrrrican food.  However, I'm forced to give this place at least 3 stars because the patio was right on the strip and provided a perfect location to get a quick afternoon lunch in the beautiful Vegas weather.  The waitstaff (ok so maybe I should refer to them as stripper-like) was also very attentive and our food came out quickly.  This place is drowning in mediocrity but the patio was still pretty awesome.

0-8biVKNBwJ1w7b5pnL8dA.text: LOVED this place.. went here last weekend and had a BLAST!! Make sure you sit around the mechanical bull.. that is REAL FUN.. and ride the Bull too.. haha. LOTS of FUN! Good Happy Hour too. 1st time going last weekend and will for sure make it another visit next time in Vegas.

plU52RpINvtNWQtMPTU8Ng.text: I have been here 2-3 times now, I don't live far. But, every time friends come in and visit we go here for lunch. I had a burger, was very good. Prices weren't too bad either, service was great!

Spb6Owh-ce9PNzlgeGbF-g.text: Vegas is full of similar places that serve up burgers and other American favorites for high prices. PBR Rock Bar wasn't much different, and it was our last resort after encountering long waits at better restaurants. I had the pulled pork sandwich that ended up being extremely dry, so we asked for BBQ sauce to add some moisture to the meat. The slaw was a nice touch, and I liked that it wasn't loaded with mayo. The sandwich as a whole was a good portion size, but the flavors were nothing spectacular. I'd recommend spending a little more time doing research before dining out in Vegas, otherwise you'll end up with mediocre meals like this!

photos.caption: Photo of PBR Rock Bar & Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Pulled chipotle chicken sandwich

9_ja-XKcavCJYpc6w-Khmw.text: The food was better than I expected. You can never go wrong with tater tots! The crowd was kinda blah for Vegas and the service was slow even for Vegas. It's a good place to close your night with some greasy food to soak up the casino booze. I'm a big fan of the Elara so I'm sure I'll be back here again at some point.

ZsiWn9VtvaMIDwVLqzlK6A.text: The wife and I were looking for some BBQ and stopped in here. The food was awesome. Our server was awesome. Thank you for showing us a great eating experience.

-FQ0bZTCAxr7GD8MNOMc0A.text: Food was really good and the portions were large. We started with potato skins that were wonderful. They had tons of cheese and bacon. Then I had their chili, which I want the recipe for. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the wooden picnic table seating was hard on my rump.

NoPZHg5MQfoP5uXXTktgow.text: Mixed feelings on this one.  We were only a little hungry after a show so we stopped in here and shared a pepperoni pizza.  It was a good pizza, but not a must have again pizza.  Service was quick and friendly.  I think the reason I won't be back is because of the noise.  Too loud for me.

boNXkWSiEaysv09l8SverQ.text: The grub is delicious! They serve huge portions and at a very good price. The atmosphere is fun and the service is great! You get a free bull ride for eating here. I will be back every time I visit Las Vegas!

photos.caption: Photo of PBR Rock Bar & Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. BBQ Chicken Sandwich with Potato Salad

Jf5LwIQHTEEYQHgAYdGYEg.text: I must say this place was awesome. The food was great and we got to sit at a fire pit while we ate our dinner. Really cool atmosphere, but be prepared to shell out some cash. For it being on the strip the prices were't bad, but from what I was used to it was a wake up call. Would definitely recommend this place to anyone who likes a country atmosphere and doesn't mind watching some sports on the tv.

photos.caption: Photo of PBR Rock Bar & Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States

CJOQX_69He2IDRtKKzeh2g.text: Nice, open seating. The service was not great, server wasn't very attentive and food took forever! They also didn't help us get the game we wanted to watch on tv until it was almost over.

f2b4IRtHzzaBTgzmDSfIYA.text: A huge place inside the mall/Planet Hollywood.  They have a large outdoor area as well as tons of space inside.  They have a full menu as well drinks, drink, and more drinks.  Lets face it, we are all in Vegas to drink so might as well drink for a good price, and this is the place to do it.  They have great prices and tons of deals, like two for one and at certain days/times ladies get $1 drinks!  Love it!  They also have fun games and things to do while you drink, such as battle shots.

veqClPs4StEI5WsiuAjHYQ.text: Came here, since the line at Earl of Sandwich was literally a "miracle" mile long. Haha  Food was pretty good. It's Just your typical, American food joint. I had the pulled pork sandwich with a side of fresh fruit. There was a generous portion of pork and it was tender and juicy. It definitely tasted mass produced though. No worries, that's probably why the food comes out so quickly. The bar area/decor is pretty cool. There's lots of TVs, so this place could potentially be a great spot to eat/drink and watch some games. Very fair food prices. They also got a mechanical bull there, which probably equals wardrobe malfunctions and fun times.   A little about my credentials: I first got into cooking & food when I was in college. After being rejected by numerous girls and getting zero action, I decided it was time for a change. I needed a new makeover to boost my geeky, engineering image. I applied for a cooking position at a Mediterranean-Italian  Restaurant near my home and learned to cook all sorts of pastas and dishes. I never became a professional chef, but I continue to enjoy & love food. 9 years later and 55 lbs heavier, I have a new passion for traveling and trying different foods around the world.

gwPGTPZ7b2MxqjrYWyxfWA.text: Good food, the atmosphere is for the 21-41 crowd,,,"loud and fun"!!!! Pricey but that's what you will get on the strip in Las Vegas !!! Ride the bull Baybee

ZSMblNlH5PFzeZ8XhHPemQ.text: I was excited to try a new place on the strip! I had friends come in from out of town and this place came to mind. I have seen it many times while playing tourist. It was always pretty busy, so I thought, let's give it a try.  I ordered the chili cheese burger with fries. 2 of my friends got the burger that had fried pickles and my other friend had the club.  The food came out quick and presentation was fine.   The burgers weren't huge, but enough for one person. My burger was just okay. Nothing impressive. The fries on the other hand were very tasty! Prices on the menu were average for a place on the strip.    I won't be going back to this place.  Service was great, but the food is nothing to write home about. There are a lot more places on the strip that are 10 times better.

photos.caption: Photo of PBR Rock Bar & Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chili cheese burger with fries

QAlhYgzKacWVJd8qCjo2_g.text: Me and my brother got scammed into coming in with a "All You Can Drink" wristband for $25 each.6   Did you know they even water down BEER?!? It's not the bland tasting cocktails that won't even get you buzzed (I drink about 6 regular cans a day).   Everything tasted like they added a drop of rubbing alcohol into plastic cups of water.  Also the mechanical bull is operated by a girl in the back with a joystick. So I saw this fat chick get on top of the mechanical bull, and at the end, the bull literally threw her into the corner of the padded spot. We thought she was okay at first, but then she wasn't moving. Like unconscious or in a coma or something.  When the staff bouncers got over there to help her up, the fat lady's meathead friends were about to get into a altercation with the lady that was operating the bull. Me and my brother left after that, and then walked across the venue 5 minutes later only to find a police paddy wagon, a ambulance, and a cop car with 4 cops taking down a police report outside.

HqFhxPtrEGLE4gXU2d2bdA.text: Came here with a group of 6 early on a Friday afternoon, it was around 1pm and raining so the restaurant was nearly empty but the customer service was sooo bad.  We were seated at a table then waited around for approx 15minutes while the table next to us was served. The waitress didn't even make eye contact with us or say hello...doesn't make sense because I don't know how you miss a table of 6 people in a nearly empty restaurant.   Still waiting around with no service we decided to go to the bar while my husband waited at the table. 3 of the 4 were able to get drinks while I waited around and got nothing. Yay me!   Hubby waited at the table and got nothing but irritable so needless to say we left and went straight to Pink's and tore it up.  Thanks Rock Bar, at least the drinks were good according to the people that got theirs.

Lc9o2P7JfxQ97sGUYsyZ7g.text: Haven't tried the food just yet, we all came in just for the chance to give our bachelorette the opportunity to do some bull riding!! haha.. It was fun that they actually had one here on the vegas strip, very convenient for things like that :) we had an awesome time watching our bachelorette riding the bull hahaha.. next time, we gotta try the food to match :)

photos.caption: Photo of PBR Rock Bar & Grill - Las Vegas, NV, United States

dunBwrFtbdvOptpR4GTVuw.text: Service is just ok, not spectacular.  BBQ ribs were ok, but could have uses more sauce. The brisket was pretty tender but real fatty. I expected better for the price

hrgjHAjs50MTFcSCUlWT4g.text: I was craving BBQ while on the strip. Looked at the menu before committing to a table. The pulled pork sandwich with cole slaw looked amazing. Done.   Unfortunately, the service took extremely long. By the time I got lemons for my water I was already on my second glass. The food took a while, and when it came out it didn't look anything like the picture. Asked for extra slaw (yum!) because what was served on the burger was sparse (boo!). By the time it came out we had finished eating.   Decent ribs but the service took so long, not worth the wait! Great location on the strip but you can do better with food quality and service.

TJZZNgx7C_ZNOBDW1duXWQ.text: came here on a Sunday, NFL games were playing and service was great-had the buffalo wings and a beer-cool rodeo theme-check was decent and the beer was cold!
